title: no launch game
body:
please help me when I turn on so I find myself new client so I'm launching and nothing goes wrong Can you please help me ?
sorry for my bad english i m from Czech Republic sorry

replies.body: Give your pc a restart in case something crashed in the background.  If the patcher still isn't launching then a security setting might be getting in the way.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix that issue!
